bustle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to move around quickly, looking very busy
bustle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Madge bustled round the room, putting things away.
bustle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a continual bustle of people coming and going
bustle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a frame worn by women in the past to hold out the back of their skirts
